section.name: Registering your project with java.net maven repository
section.p: The javanet:register-repository goal performs a registration of your project to the java.net-wide maven repository. This goal only needs to be run once per one project, and within an hour or so, you'll receive an e-mail confirming your registration.
Once the registration is complete, you can start using the javanet:deploy-XXX goals to push artifacts into the repository.
